attributes.action: We ask David Cameron to debate on live television, his case to stay in the EU
attributes.background: It is right that the democratically elected leader of our country should take a lead in issues of national importance. In this regard, he should state the case for staying in the EU in a live TV debate so that his views can be tested and challenged. This guards against unjustified propaganda.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It would be up to television companies to arrange a debate and to invite people to attend.
